page.title: 04A girls Christmas holiday
page.content: On the last day of school we were ready to go to Kent. Mrs Ogburn came for us and we went to Salisbury to wait for the driver of the Victoria coach. In the coach I fell asleep and had to be woken up. Then we went to Strood on the coach from Victoria. From there we caught the bus from Strood to Allhallows. When we arrived we sat down and looked at the decorations. We had a long wait till Christmas day. When it came we opened the presents. I had a jumper, two dresses, pillow cases, quilt, curtains, pencil case, personal hi-fi, barbie doll, charm bracelet, two charms, a fairy castle, a grand piano box, shoes, purse, scarf, earrings, pen, teddy, tape, nightie, pyjamas, rucksack, soap, talc, bath cube set, necklace, watch, a tangerine, and sweets galore.
